languages.text: "Губернатор Вистенца говорит, что "чувствует правильность" решения поддержать в бою лиловых духов, но ожидает вашего разрешения".
"Governor Vyatt claims to have 'sensed' that the right decision would be to support the purple spirits in this battle, but, naturally, she defers to your judgement."
languages.original_text: "Губернатор Вистенца говорит, что "чувствует правильность" решения поддержать в бою лиловых духов, но ожидает вашего разрешения".

traits.locale_text: "Governor Vyatt claims to have 'sensed' that the right decision would be to support the purple spirits in this battle, but, naturally, she defers to your judgement."
"Governor Vyatt claims to have 'sensed' that the right decision would be to support the purple spirits in this battle, but, naturally, she defers to your judgement."
"Governor Vyatt claims to have 'sensed' that the right decision would be to support the purple spirits in this battle, but, naturally, she defers to your judgement."
"Governor Vyatt claims to have 'sensed' that the right decision would be to support the purple spirits in this battle, but, naturally, she defers to your judgement."
"Governor Vyatt claims to have 'sensed' that the right decision would be to support the purple spirits in this battle, but, naturally, she defers to your judgement."
"Governor Vyatt claims to have 'sensed' that the right decision would be to support the purple spirits in this battle, but, naturally, she defers to your judgement."

languages.text: “维亚特总督声称，她‘感觉到’在这场战斗中支持紫色的幽灵才是正确的决定。但当然，她仍会听从您的判断。”
languages.original_text: "Governor Vyatt claims to have 'sensed' that the right decision would be to support the purple spirits in this battle, but, naturally, she defers to your judgement."

traits.locale_text: “维亚特总督声称，她‘感觉到’在这场战斗中支持紫色的幽灵才是正确的决定。但当然，她仍会听从您的判断。”

languages.text: «La gobernadora Vyatt afirma haber "intuido" que la decisión correcta sería apoyar a los espíritus púrpuras en esta batalla, pero, naturalmente, se remite a tu criterio».
languages.original_text: "Governor Vyatt claims to have 'sensed' that the right decision would be to support the purple spirits in this battle, but, naturally, she defers to your judgement."

traits.locale_text: «La gobernadora Vyatt afirma haber "intuido" que la decisión correcta sería apoyar a los espíritus púrpuras en esta batalla, pero, naturalmente, se remite a tu criterio».

languages.text: 「総督ビャットは、この戦闘で紫色の精霊をサポートすることが正しい決断だと'感知した'と主張していますが、当然のことながら、彼女はあなたの判断に従うことになるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Governor Vyatt claims to have 'sensed' that the right decision would be to support the purple spirits in this battle, but, naturally, she defers to your judgement."

traits.locale_text: 「総督ヴァイアットは、この戦闘で紫色の精霊をサポートすることが正しい決断だと'感知した'と主張していますが、当然のことながら、彼女はあなたの判断に従うことになるでしょう」

languages.text: « La gouverneure Vyatt affirme avoir "senti" que notre soutien devait aller aux esprits de couleur mauve, mais elle s'en remet naturellement à votre jugement. »
languages.original_text: "Governor Vyatt claims to have 'sensed' that the right decision would be to support the purple spirits in this battle, but, naturally, she defers to your judgement."

traits.locale_text: « La gouverneure Vyatt affirme avoir "senti" que notre soutien devait aller aux esprits de couleur mauve, mais elle s'en remet naturellement à votre jugement. »

languages.text: "Gouverneurin Vyatt sagt, sie haben 'gespürt', dass es die richtige Entscheidung wäre, die violetten Geister in diesem Kampf zu unterstützen. Aber natürlich liegt die Entscheidung bei Euch."
languages.original_text: "Governor Vyatt claims to have 'sensed' that the right decision would be to support the purple spirits in this battle, but, naturally, she defers to your judgement."

traits.locale_text: "Gouverneurin Vyatt sagt, sie haben 'gespürt', dass es die richtige Entscheidung wäre, die violetten Geister in diesem Kampf zu unterstützen. Aber natürlich liegt die Entscheidung bei Euch."

languages.text: "Vali Vyatt, doğru kararın çatışmada mor ruhları desteklemek olduğunu 'hissettiğini' iddia ediyor ve beklendiği üzere kararınızı uygulamayı ağırdan alıyor."
languages.original_text: "Governor Vyatt claims to have 'sensed' that the right decision would be to support the purple spirits in this battle, but, naturally, she defers to your judgement."
